title: Metering Mode Metadata & Performance Improvements
summary: Frames for macOS now includes metering mode metadata support for comprehensive EXIF data, plus performance improvements for faster, more stable operation.

sections.content: You can now see and reintegrate metering mode data from your film logs into scanned images. This matches the iOS update, ensuring complete metadata consistency across both platforms. Performance upgrades throughout the app make metadata reintegration faster and more reliable.

sections.alt: Frames macOS app showing metering mode metadata support for complete EXIF data

improvements: Performance upgrades for faster image processing

patches.description: Various UI enhancements and visual refinements.

meta_title: Metering Mode Metadata & Performance Improvements - Frames
meta_description: Frames for macOS now includes metering mode metadata support for comprehensive EXIF data, plus performance improvements for faster, more stable operation.
